scripts.prod:build-docker: export CACHE_REF=$(echo $REPO_NAME | tr ':' '-'):buildcache && echo $CACHE_REF; cd ../.. && docker buildx build . --platform linux/amd64 --cache-to="type=registry,ref=${CACHE_REF},mode=max" --cache-from="type=registry,ref=${CACHE_REF}" -t $REPO_NAME --push $@
scripts.prod:docker-compose-up: echo "$PRODUCTION_SSH_KEY" > /tmp/id_rsa && chmod 700 /tmp/id_rsa && ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i /tmp/id_rsa $PRODUCTION_SSH_USER@$PRODUCTION_SSH_HOST "cd $REMOTE_ROOT/$DIR && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate $SERVICES"
